ssh.description: A basic SSH client. Written with Java 11, Apache Mina, JBang and Picocli

sort.description: A sample sort program to illustrate Java stream and Array sort use. Written with JBang and Picocli

links.description: A program to retrieve the posts metadata of my former blog archived on https://web.archive.org. Written with Jsoup, Gson, JBang and Picocli

html.description: A program to build the archive page for my new blog from the posts.json file generated by Links. Written with Gson, JBang and Picocli

sizeof.description: A program to display the memory size of Java primitive types and their corresponding wrapper classes. Written with OpenJDK jol, JBang and Picocli

git-clone.description: A basic `git clone` replacement in Java. Written with jGit, JBang and Picocli

git-get.description: A command to get one or more files (or directories) from a Git repository. Written with jGit, JBang and Picocli

whats-new-in-java.description: A command to display methods added to a Java class (or made deprecated) in a given JDK release. Written with Java 11, JBang and Picocli

statusCode.description: A sample sort program to illustrate Java 11 HttpClient use

vote.description: A program to compute the result of a weighted vote

cli17.description: Basic template for Java 17 CLI with Picocli
